page.title: 04Murderball.
page.content: { Murderball}is a game everyone can play.It is played in a small area of the playground.You play it with a football and you have to{kick}it at people. The aim is to hit someone {below the neck}and{above the knee.}If you do this, the person hit by the ball loses a life. Everyone has three lives to begin with.If you lose all three lives you are out of the game.The last person to have any lives left is the winner. The number of lives that the winner has left are added on to the next game. Anyone who kicks the ball out of the playing area has to go and fetch it.This player has to stand outside the playing area and kick the ball back in. No-one is allowed to{handle}the ball but{heading}is permitted.
